description: Multi-modal deepfake detection orchestration with aggregated threat scores and compliance reporting

key_findings: No audio file or stream was provided for analysis.
Detected consistent facial boundary blending artifacts characteristic of AI-based face swapping techniques (frames 00:07-00:18, 00:31-00:38)
GAN-generated texture smoothness, color banding, checkerboard artifacts (frames 00:09-00:13, 00:33)
Lip movement lagged behind audio during key moments (frames 00:21, 00:36)
Lighting inconsistency causing unnatural shadow patterns (frames 00:15-00:18, 00:40-00:44)

compliance_report.audit_trail: Video source was analyzed by both visual and voice deepfake detection agents. Only the video stream was available; audio could not be analyzed due to missing file. Key deepfake signatures found: boundary artifacts, GAN texture patterns, lip sync mismatch, and lighting illusions indicative of facial manipulation.
compliance_report.evidence_summary: Visual artifacts consistent with synthetic generation were found in at least 6 distinct segments. Lip sync issues and lighting flaws further support deepfake suspicion. Full video audit available on request.

recommended_actions: Flag this session for forensic review by compliance/fraud teams
Initiate customer re-verification by independent means

recommendations: Reject the current verification and request alternative methods.
Notify compliance and fraud prevention teams for urgent review.
Consider updating anti-deepfake training and escalation protocols.
